scripts.postinstall: cd backend && go mod download && cd ../ && npm run create-cert
scripts.clean:full: rimraf -v -I backend/server backend/server.exe backend/data dist frontend/dist frontend/node_modules node_modules zene.localhost.pem zene.localhost-key.pem
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && cross-env LOCAL_DEV_ENV=true MUSIC_DIR=E:/music FFMPEG_PATH=../node_modules/.bin/ffmpeg FFPROBE_PATH=../node_modules/.bin/ffprobe go run .
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && go build -o server . && cpy server . --rename=server.exe
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && cpy dist ../
scripts.build: cross-env CGO_ENABLED=0 npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.preview:go: cd backend && cross-env LOCAL_DEV_ENV=true MUSIC_DIR=E:/music FFMPEG_PATH=../node_modules/.bin/ffmpeg FFPROBE_PATH=../node_modules/.bin/ffprobe server.exe
